scripts.dangerous-clean-s3-prod: aws s3 rm s3://raw-data-po --recursive && aws s3 rm s3://data-products-po --recursive && aws s3 rm s3://tile-server-po --recursive && aws s3 rm s3://logfiles-po --recursive
scripts.dangerous-clean-s3-dev: aws s3 rm s3://raw-data-po-dev --recursive && aws s3 rm s3://data-products-po-dev --recursive && aws s3 rm s3://tile-server-po-dev --recursive && aws s3 rm s3://logfiles-po-dev --recursive
scripts.push-ecr: sudo docker login --username AWS --password `aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2` 000009394762.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com && sudo docker tag parcel-outlet:latest 000009394762.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/parcel-outlet:latest && sudo docker push 000009394762.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/parcel-outlet:latest
